org.apache.hadoop.fs

Class FileContextURIBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileContextURIBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestLocal_S3FileContextURI, TestS3_LocalFileContextURI

    public abstract class FileContextURIBase
extends Object

    A collection of tests for the FileContext to test path names passed as URIs. This test should be used for testing an instance of FileContext that has been initialized to a specific default FileSystem such a LocalFileSystem, HDFS,S3, etc, and where path names are passed that are URIs in a different FileSystem.

    To test a given FileSystem implementation create a subclass of this test and override setUp() to initialize the fc1 and fc2 The tests will do operations on fc1 that use a URI in fc2 FileContext instance variable.

      • isTestableFileNameOnPlatform

        private static boolean isTestableFileNameOnPlatform(String fileName)
        Returns true if the argument is a file name that is testable on the platform currently running the test. This is intended for use by tests so that they can skip checking file names that aren't supported by the underlying platform. The current implementation specifically checks for patterns that are not valid file names on Windows when the tests are running on Windows.
        Parameters:
        fileName - String file name to check
        Returns:
        boolean true if the argument is valid as a file name
